languages.text: "Слушай и запоминай — во имя Императора я вырежу всех вас!"

traits.locale_text: "Мне плевать на этого идиота. Слушай и запоминай — во имя Императора я вырежу всех вас!"

languages.text: "Listen and remember, in the Emperor's name, I will end you all!"
languages.original_text: "Слушай и запоминай — во имя Императора я вырежу всех вас!"

traits.locale_text: "I don't care about that idiot. Listen in remember, in the Emperor's name I will end you all!"
"I don't care about that idiot. Listen in remember, in the Emperor's name I will end you all!"
"I do not care about that idiot. Listen and remember, in the Emperor's name, I will end you all!"
"I do not care about that idiot. Listen and remember, in the Emperor's name, I will end you all!"
"Listen and remember, in the Emperor's name, I will end you all!"

languages.text: “你们都给我听好了，我会以帝皇的名义把你们统统杀光！”
languages.original_text: "Listen and remember, in the Emperor's name, I will end you all!"

traits.locale_text: “我不在乎那个蠢货会怎么样。你们都给我听好了，我会以帝皇的名义把你们杀光！”

languages.text: 「よく聞け。皇帝の名において、私はお前ら全員を始末する！」
languages.original_text: "Listen and remember, in the Emperor's name, I will end you all!"

traits.locale_text: 「よく聞け。皇帝の名において、私はお前ら全員を始末する！」

languages.text: «Escuchad y no lo olvidéis: ¡en nombre del Emperador, acabaré con todos vosotros!».
languages.original_text: "Listen and remember, in the Emperor's name, I will end you all!"

traits.locale_text: «No me importa ese imbécil. Escuchad y no lo olvidéis: ¡en nombre del Emperador, acabaré con todos vosotros!».

languages.text: « Écoutez-moi bien et souvenez-vous de mes paroles : je vous exterminerai tous au nom de l'Empereur ! »
languages.original_text: "Listen and remember, in the Emperor's name, I will end you all!"

traits.locale_text: « Je me moque de cet imbécile. Écoutez-moi bien et souvenez-vous de mes paroles : je vous exterminerai tous au nom de l'Empereur ! »

languages.text: "Hört zu und merkt es Euch: Im Namen des Imperators, ich werde Euch alle vernichten!"
languages.original_text: "Listen and remember, in the Emperor's name, I will end you all!"

traits.locale_text: "Mir ist dieser Idiot völlig egal. Hört zu und merkt es Euch: Im Namen des Imperators, ich werde Euch alle vernichten!"

languages.text: "Kulaklarını aç ve şunu aklına yaz: İmparator adına hepinizin sonunu ben getireceğim!"
languages.original_text: "Listen and remember, in the Emperor's name, I will end you all!"

traits.locale_text: "Kulaklarını aç ve şunu aklına yaz: İmparator adına hepinizin sonunu ben getireceğim!"
